code: import{purchaseActionType}from'../../constants';export default(function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case purchaseActionType.FETCH_PURCHASES:return action.payload;case purchaseActionType.FETCH_PURCHASE:return action.payload;case purchaseActionType.ADD_PURCHASE:return action.payload;case purchaseActionType.EDIT_PURCHASE:return state.map(item=>item.id===+action.payload.id?action.payload:item);case purchaseActionType.DELETE_PURCHASE:return state.filter(item=>item.id!==action.payload);default:return state;}});
